response: Welcome to the OLA Scooter product training module. Our goal is to familiarize you with the features and specifications of OLA Scooters, their digital technology, performance, and competitive edge. We've structured the module into seven parts: an introduction, a detailed look at the scooter, its design, technology, and performance, the ease of ownership, the features, advantages, and benefits, an overview of the OLA Scooter family, and a comparison with competitors. Let's dive in!
title: L1.1.1 Introduction to Product Module.mp4
